meanings.definition: A type of marine worm that resembles a clam in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The clamworms burrowed into the sand to hide from predators.
meanings.sent2: We observed a group of clamworms wriggling in the shallow water.
meanings.sent3: Why did the clamworms throw a party? Because they wanted to shell-ebrate!
meanings.sent4: The clamworms' shells glistened in the sunlight, like tiny treasures hidden in the sand.
meanings.sent5: As the tide receded, the clamworms emerged from their sandy homes, ready to explore.
